title: Letting go
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation and Anne Whitehead
brief_description: This drama explores the communication difficulties and differences in values between the generations in a fairly typical Australian family. Conflict reaches a crisis point when the seventeen-year-old daughter decides to leave home and live with her boyfriend. Cast includes: Robyn Nevin, John Ewart, Karena Menzie, Miranda Cartledge, Jeremy Scrivener, Phillip Priest.
